member.name: NL_LINK_LOCAL_ADDRESS_BEHAVIOR
member.summary: The NL_LINK_LOCAL_ADDRESS_BEHAVIOR enumeration type defines the link local address behavior.

member.name: NL_LINK_LOCAL_ADDRESS_BEHAVIOR.LinkLocalAlwaysOff
member.summary: A link local IP address should never be used.

member.name: NL_LINK_LOCAL_ADDRESS_BEHAVIOR.LinkLocalDelayed
member.summary: A link local IP address should be used only if no other address is available. This setting is the default setting for an IPv4 interface.

member.name: NL_LINK_LOCAL_ADDRESS_BEHAVIOR.LinkLocalAlwaysOn
member.summary: A link local IP address should always be used. This setting is the default setting for an IPv6 interface.

member.name: NL_LINK_LOCAL_ADDRESS_BEHAVIOR.LinkLocalUnchanged
member.summary: When the properties of an IP interface are being set, the value for link local address behavior should be unchanged.
